buildInstructions.description: Step-by-step instructions for building the Weather Forecast Dashboard based on the answers above
steps: 1. Review and answer all configuration questions above
2. Set up project structure based on chosen framework and build tool
3. Install required dependencies (React, charting library, icons, etc.)
4. Configure API integration with chosen weather provider
5. Implement geolocation and location search features
6. Build current weather display component with selected metrics
7. Create forecast components (hourly/daily) based on configuration
8. Implement charts using selected charting library and configurations
9. Apply UI design with chosen theme, colors, and layout
10. Add responsive design for mobile and tablet
11. Implement selected features (auto-refresh, notifications, etc.)
12. Add data management and caching based on configuration
13. Implement accessibility features as specified
14. Set up security measures for API key protection
15. Add error handling and loading states
16. Optimize performance (lazy loading, minification, etc.)
17. Write tests if specified
18. Create documentation (README, comments, etc.)
19. Configure deployment pipeline
20. Deploy to chosen hosting platform
